summary:
Midoriya: [Holds the door open for Todoroki after grocery shopping]
Todoroki: After you
Midoriya: No no after you
Todoroki: No I...
body:
Midoriya: [Holds the door open for Todoroki after grocery shopping]
Todoroki: After you
Midoriya: No no after you
Todoroki: No I insist, after you
All Might: [Holding all the shopping bags]
All Might: I don’t want to rush you but these are heavy

Thomas. 23. Italian. Male. Feminist. Literal Pile of Salt. Asexual. Aromantic. Bisexual. Massive Nerd.
English isn't my first language. Ravenclaw. Evil Overlord. I tend to be Sappy about my OTPs and Salty about my NOTPs.

tags: under normal circumstances I'd keep them but money's a smidge tight rn so I have to try and sell what of my merch I can bear to part with rn
summary: So I bought the box set of BNHA omanjuus (my roommate wanted a few and I wanted a couple) and I have the Iida and Denki ones...
body: So I bought the box set of BNHA omanjuus (my roommate wanted a few and I wanted a couple) and I have the Iida and Denki ones available for sale if anyone’s interested! I’m in New York so shipping to anywhere in the States would be cheap/easy enough but outside it would push the price up more than it’s worth just from shipping. If you’re interested in one or both PM me!

reblog.comment: So I bought the box set of BNHA omanjuus (my roommate wanted a few and I wanted a couple) and I have the Iida and Denki ones available for sale if anyone’s interested! summary: I’m trying to come up with some My Hero Academia jewelry ideas but im having trouble. I have the format I want but I can’t think...
body:
I’m trying to come up with some My Hero Academia jewelry ideas but im having trouble. I have the format I want but I can’t think of charms(like charm bracelet charms) for everyone. I’m having trouble figuring out charms for: Deku, All Might, Aizawa, Momo, Mina, Mirio, 

If you have any ideas I would love to hear them!

summary: Shinso Hitoshi x Reader | Be more sociable.
title: Shinso Hitoshi x Reader | Be more sociable.
description:
by goodboikiri

Shinsou has finally joined the Class 1-A to become a hero. But Aizawa thought that his social skills weren’t the best so he decided to give him someone that he can socialize with. Someone very talkative. Perhaps annoying for Aizawa’s liking, but still someone that can cheer anyone up. Even Shinsou.

Words: 466, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Shinsou Hitoshi, Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki, Todoroki Shouto, Kirishima Eijirou, Iida Tenya, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Kaminari Denki, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), Ashido Mina, Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic, Asui Tsuyu, Jirou Kyouka, Tokoyami Fumikage, Mineta Minoru, Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Shouji Mezou, Kouda Kouji

  • Additional Tags: Fluff and Humor, Friendship, Bad Jokes, Sexual Humor, I Wrote This Instead of Sleeping, I’m Bad At Summaries, Sharing a Bed, Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot

summary: Okay, now that I’ve see the BNHA movie, can we talk about those ugly ass shoes with that tux deku was wearing? Like, Izuku,...
body: Okay, now that I’ve see the BNHA movie, can we talk about those ugly ass shoes with that tux deku was wearing? Like, Izuku, sweetheart, those are not dress shoes, they don’t match the tux at all. I love you, but please.
